snippet: The artistic director of Sonia Rykiel discusses the treasures she found in the designer’s former office, and what responsibilities she can’t trust to anyone else.
abstract: Julie de Libran, artistic director of Sonia Rykiel, offers tour of her workplace in designer's former office in Paris.
lead_paragraph: The artistic director of Sonia Rykiel discusses the treasures she found in the designer’s former office, and what responsibilities she can’t trust to anyone else.

headline.main: Julie de Libran: In the Studio
